name: URL Path Validator
description: Validates if a given string looks like an url path without query string and trailing slash
content:
supported pathes:
/a/path/to/a/sample%20resource
/Post-01
/2014-12-05
/path_with_underscores

Path with trailing Slash:
/a/path/to/a/tiny%20resource-with_trailing_slash/

Root Path:
/
author: Christian Hermsen
